0.2.name: wordpress/simple-author-highlighter
0.2.description: Simple Author Highlighter is a simple WordPress plug-in that can customize the color of the author's comments or any selected users (for example the admins). The installation process is extremely simple and accessible and after install, Simple Author Highlighter can be found in the "Plugins" menu in WordPress.
